resources.string:
INGREDIENTS 
• 2 cup dried fish(shrimp, anchovy, etc.) 
• 3 tablespoons mustard oil 
• 4-5 cloves garlic 
• 2-3 red chili 
• ¼ onion, thinly sliced 
• 3 teaspoon lemon juice 
• Salt to taste 
 INSTRUCTIONS 
 1. On medium heat, dry roast dried fish, garlic, chili. 
 2. Put everything is a food processor and chop. 
 NOTES 
 Adjust oil, lemon juice, chili and garlic according to taste.
